scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:api
scripts.build:api: npm run db:generate && cp -r api dist/ && cp public/health.json dist/
scripts.prebuild: mkdir -p dist/data dist/public && cp -r app/data/* dist/data/ && [ -f public/raceday-logo.svg ] && cp public/raceday-logo.svg dist/public/ || echo 'Logo file not found, skipping'
scripts.db:migrate: cd api/prisma && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate:prod: cd api/prisma && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:push: cd api/prisma && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:reset: cd api/prisma && npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.db:init: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:setup:dev: cp api/prisma/schema.dev.prisma api/prisma/schema.prisma && npm run db:init
scripts.prisma:dev: cd api/prisma && npx prisma migrate dev
